name: SCStreamConfiguration
desc: An object that provides the output configuration for a stream.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a stream configuration with default values.

items.name: var scalesToFit: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to scale the output to fit the configured width and height.

items.name: var sourceRect: CGRect
items.desc: A rectangle that specifies the source area to capture.

items.name: var destinationRect: CGRect
items.desc: A rectangle that specifies a destination into which to write the output.

items.name: var pixelFormat: OSType
items.desc: A pixel format for sample buffers that a stream outputs.

items.name: var colorMatrix: CFString
items.desc: A color matrix to apply to the output surface.

items.name: var colorSpaceName: CFString
items.desc: A color space to use for the output buffer.

items.name: var backgroundColor: CGColor
items.desc: A background color for the output.

items.name: var showsCursor: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the cursor is visible in the stream.

items.name: var queueDepth: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of frames for the queue to store.

items.name: var minimumFrameInterval: CMTime
items.desc: The desired minimum time between frame updates, in seconds.
